attributes.action: Vote of "No Confidence" in our government and call for a General Election
attributes.additional_details: The existing voting system no longer works and we should also consider proportional representation for the new government to be determined
attributes.background: Our new Prime Minister has been elected into Power on the back of a series of actions which have led to many people in the UK having no faith in our existing government or political system.  Lies are rife causing we "the voters" to be unsure on which way to turn when voting.
